original: intros st h os st' ms H. unfold doLeader in H. destruct (type st) eqn:type_st. - destruct (advanceCommitIndex st h) eqn:advance_eq. + destruct (shouldSend r) eqn:shouldSend_eq. * inversion H; subst; clear H. unfold lastApplied, advanceCommitIndex in *. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec (lastApplied st) (commitIndex st)) as [[Hlt|Heq]|Hlt]. { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq; auto. } { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq; auto. } { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq. } * inversion H; subst; clear H. unfold lastApplied, advanceCommitIndex in *. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec (lastApplied st) (commitIndex st)) as [[Hlt|Heq]|Hlt]. { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq; auto. } { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq; auto. } { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq. } + inversion H; subst; clear H. unfold lastApplied, advanceCommitIndex in *. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec (lastApplied st) (commitIndex st)) as [[Hlt|Heq]|Hlt]. { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq; auto. } { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq; auto. } { rewrite advance_eq in Heq; inversion Heq. } - inversion H; subst; clear H. unfold lastApplied in *. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec (lastApplied st) (commitIndex st)) as [[Hlt|Heq]|Hlt]. { auto. } { auto. } { auto. }
